title: Only Hussies Wear Blue Eye Shadow
description: After the Asheville Citizen-Times gave Susan Gamrell Reinhardt a chance in 1995 resulting in her own column, she now is a columnist featured on the Gannett News Services wire and her work appears in dozens of Gannett papers from Washington to New Jersey and between. Throughout her career sheâ€™s won dozens of state and national honors for her tri-weekly column, features and fiction. This book is a collection of her works.
author: Susan Reinhardt
